Sunhawk fired a laser on each side of he (including up
and down) to cmpensate for dodging and one straight at
him.

--- Jonathan <jhogan@...> wrote:
> > He threw a grenade on each side of Nightshade.
> >
> 
> {Nightshade}
> 
>     Nightshade smiled almost as if she was enjoying
> the challenge and took
> the route the flyer hadn't covered...straight up.
> Her powerful legs, the
> hind legs of her fox form, strong for running and
> jumping, flexed as she
> jumped straight up sumersaulting upwards even as the
> grenades exploded
> around her, the damage was minor she knew but this
> bot might actually get
> lucky.
> 
>      Landing on her feet she tilted her head, "Now
> are you gonna take me to
> the maximal in charge? Or are you gonna waste more
> of both our times..." She
> quite firmly believed the latter and readied herself
> for the next attack, he
> tried sword, he tried grenade, he'd either go for a
> grapple to limit her
> speed or a projectile for which she could only
> dodge. Then again, this bot
> hadn't shown much wisdom in his attacks so far,
> playing off his rage was
> easy but if she wasn't careful she'd eventually slip
> up.
> 
> 
>
